name: Bristol Ultimate Development
description: We are a sociable, development-focused ultimate frisbee club open to anyone wanting to try the sport!
details: Regular frisbee games on the Downs, with indoor training sessions during the winter.

time.details: Social games. See the Facebook group for the latest details.

cost.details: If you attend regularly, there is a small membership fee that covers the season of play.

booking.details: Booking recommended so the organisers have a sense of numbers, please join the Facebook group and vote in the latest poll.
